alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 1:24AM CDT until September 09 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Henderson County in East Texas... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 123 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Trinidad, or 10 miles south of Gun Barrel City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Malakoff, Tool, Trinidad, Enchanted Oaks, Caney City, Trinidad Lake, Forest Grove Reservoir, Cedar Creek Reservoir, Cross Roads, Payne Springs, Log Cabin, Star Harbor, Crescent Heights, and Mankin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
